The meaning of these two verses is given together.
The intelligent who have understood the Supreme Lord in association with pure devotees
and have become freed from bad materialism
can never avoid hearing the glories of the Lord
even though they have heard them only once.
How then could the Pandavas tolerate his separation?
For they had been intimately associated with this person
seeing him face to face, touching him, conversing with him,
sleeping, sitting and dining with him.
